com.smartdevicesdk.utils

类 LogHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartdevicesdk.utils.LogHelper

  • public class LogHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    作者:
    john 打印信息的格式控制类。 红色：出现的问题。 绿色：正常的信息。 黄色：可能出现的问题。 1 : color is black 2 : color is yellow 3 : color is blue 4 : color is red other number : color is black;

      • infoException

        @Deprecated
public static void infoException(android.widget.TextView text,
                            java.lang.String infoMsg)
        已过时。 
        TestView changed color and info message. Called after the TestView is created and whenever the TextView changes. Set your TextView's message here.
        参数:
        text - 对应控件
        infoMsg - : color is red < color name="red">#FF0000< /color>< !--红色 -->

      • info

        @Deprecated
public static void info(android.widget.TextView text,
                   java.lang.String infoMsg)
        已过时。 
        参数:
        text - 对应控件
        infoMsg - : color is black

      • infoWarning

        @Deprecated
public static void infoWarning(android.widget.TextView text,
                          java.lang.String infoMsg)
        已过时。 
        功能：警告信息文本框
        参数:
        text - 对应控件
        infoMsg - : color is yellow

      • infoMsgAndColor

        public static void infoMsgAndColor(android.widget.TextView text,
                   java.lang.String infoMsg,
                   int order)
        功能：设置文本框中的文字及颜色
        参数:
        text -
        infoMsg -
        order - :set background color. 1 : color is black. 2 : color is yellow. 3 : color is blue .4 : color is red .other number : color is black;
